synopsis.text: Mysterious immortal humans known as 'Ajin' first appeared 17 years ago on an African battlefield. Since then, whenever an Ajin is discovered in society, they are arrested and taken into custody for experimentation by the government. Kei Nagai, a high school student aspiring to become a doctor, survives a fatal accident and realizes he has been reborn as an Ajin. Now a wanted fugitive, Kei goes on the run to escape captivity and figure out the secrets behind his new abilities. In his struggles, he discovers the existence of more Ajin hidden in human society who are also trying to avoid capture. Kei must come to terms with his transformation into an immortal being feared by mankind, while protecting himself and uncovering the hidden world of the Ajin.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
